testCase.name: syncEnv - should successfully sync environment variables
syncEnv - should throw error when GITHUB_TOKEN is not set
syncEnv - should throw error when ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID is not set
syncEnv - should handle API errors gracefully
syncEnv - should use default repo values when not provided
syncEnv - should handle concurrent API requests
Workflow Lister - should list ci.yml file in .github/workflows
